title: Hope through the Darkness
description: This true inspirational story follows the authors journey when he first discovered a serious affliction of the mind known as bi-polar. Read about the battle he faced to overcome the issues brought forth by this illness. An inspirational story that chronicles the nearly 10 year path to put his life back to it's former success. A recommended read for anyone who has dealt with bi-polar manic episodes or suffered from depression. This book will provide a positive and uplifting account to help you along your journey
author: David J. Capen
